question: Ahalyabai, the saintly queen of Maheshwar (Central India) belonged to which dynasty?-
explanation: Maharani Ahilyabai Holkar (Holkar Queen of the Maratha Malwa kingdom) was born in a village of Maharashtra. In 1754 her husband Khanderao Holkar was killed in the battle of Kumbher. She was a great pioneer and builder of Hindu temples. She built a lot of temples and Dharmashalas throughout India.
